CustomField.formula: IF(LEN(Primary_Mailing_Contact__r.MailingStreet) > 0,Primary_Mailing_Contact__r.MailingStreet& br()&Primary_Mailing_Contact__r.MailingCity&", "& Primary_Mailing_Contact__r.MailingState&" "& Primary_Mailing_Contact__r.MailingPostalCode, BillingStreet& br()& BillingCity&", "& BillingState&" "& BillingPostalCode)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This will be the Primary Billing Street, unless a different Mailing Contact has been selected as the Primary for this Account
CustomField.label: Primary Mailing Street
